author: Sam Dorman
title: Appeals court reinstates Texas abortion restrictions imposed due to coronavirus pandemic
description: A federal appeals court Tuesday stayed a Texas federal judge's ruling that blocked Gov. Gregg Abbott's order closing abortion clinics due to the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
